meta_title: Predictive Maintenance Compliance Australia: WHS & Mining Guide
meta_description: Complete guide to Australian maintenance compliance. Federal WHS Act, state mining regulations, AS standards, and food safety requirements for predictive maintenance.
title: Predictive Maintenance Compliance in Australia: WHS, Mining, and Food Safety Requirements

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Predictive Maintenance Compliance in Australia

image_prompt: A photo-realistic image of a professional compliance audit scene in an Australian industrial facility. A safety inspector in high-visibility vest and hard hat reviewing documentation on a tablet with a maintenance manager. Industrial equipment visible in background with safety signage. Clean, well-organised facility. Australian flag or map subtly visible. Professional lighting, no text or logos in main focus.
target_audience: Compliance officers, maintenance managers, HSE managers, plant managers in Australian industry
regulatory_frameworks_covered: WA Mines Safety and Inspection Act 1994
QLD Mining and Quarrying Safety and Health Act 1999
QLD Coal Mining Safety and Health Act 1999
NSW Work Health and Safety (Mines and Petroleum Sites) Act 2013
AS 3800 - Electrical Equipment for Explosive Atmospheres
